DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of vildagliptin compared to voglibose in patients with type 2 diabetes. Please note this study is not being conducted in the United States.
DOC.brief_title: To Compare the Efficacy and Safey of Vildagliptin Compared to Voglibose in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis as Type 2 Diabetes Patients who have been placed on dietary therapy/exercise therapy, without achievement of glycemic control Outpatients Type 1 diabetes mellitus, diabetes that is a result of pancreatic injury, or secondary forms of diabetes Significant heart diseases Significant diabetic complications Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
